Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 29th overall pick, by Atlanta in 1967...
Earned first career win on 8/12/1971...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/15/1977 to a 3-year deal worth $3,200,000 per year...

Released by New York (A) on 2/10/1980...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/23/1980 to a 4-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/6/1984 to a 3-year deal worth $3,200,000 per year...
Drafted in 4th round, 61st overall pick, by Houston in 1985...
Injured on 6/15/1985 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
